ctx: intros a b c Hcp Hdiv.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b : Z, ZDivides a b -> Divides (Z.abs_nat a) (Z.abs_nat b)" on hypothesis of type "Divides a (b * c)".

original: intros a b c Hcp Hdiv. unfold CoPrime in Hcp. apply zdivdiv in Hdiv. assert (Hgcd: gcd (Z.of_nat a) (Z.of_nat b) 1) by auto. apply divmultgcd with (b := Z.of_nat b * Z.of_nat c) in Hgcd. - apply divzdiv. apply Hgcd. - intro Hzero. apply Z.neq_sym in Hzero. contradiction.
